website_summaries.verdict: A pricier tabletop light that's big on size and power.
pros: The light is big and bright
It comes with an adjustable dimmer, tabletop stand, and has the ability to attach to a tripod for added productivity
cons: The light itself must remain plugged in to work so it's not very portable
Users complain of flickering when the light is not set to 100%

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for my makeup vanity table, i can also record easily with my phone all of my youtube videos. You don’t need any batteries you can connect it to a functioning outlet. The light is adjustable too
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a YouTube channel and it works great. The adjustable brightness is a huge bonus and when it’s at the brightest, it’s blinding. If you’re looking for something bright- this is the product for you. The only reason I took away a star is because it came with zero instructions. I’m not even sure what some of the pieces do or where they’re supposed to go.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love it already. It doesn’t come with clear instructions but look at picture you will figure it out. It’s very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Does not work correctly, avoid
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work, but it just doesn't perform as advertised. The dimming function doesn't work correctly, it only works at %100 otherwise it flickers like it's trying to find the setting, but it never does. The stand is also profoundly cheap and flimsy. This is not worth the price, it's nothing more than a fancy makeup mirror that doesn't function as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: LucasP

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars from Me
customer_reviews.text: Very effective and compact. I went from the 18 inch with tripod to this one and it saves So much space yet still gives you the studio light. I’d say I’m a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra B

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently purchased this in the Hope's that it would help with my upcoming makeup videos that I started doing! I was a bit skeptical of how bright the light would be... I was so shocked!!!! It is super bright and perfect for filming! I do wish that the stand was able to be adjusted to make it a tab bit higher, but that itsnt really an issue since it's on my makeup desk! The added phone tripod is BOMB AF!!!! No more having to rig my phone when I go live 😂😂 . absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this lighting so much. I included 2 pictures, one with the lighting and one without. The striped shirt is with, the gray shirt us without. I am in love. My pictures look like quality photos now, at least compared to the before. I use them for my new instagram where I post my makeup looks. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joney

customer_reviews.title: Aspiring younger youtubers
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for 8 & 9 year old aspiring youtubers. I don’t allow them to post videos to youtube but they really wanted “youtuber materials”. The light has a dial in the back to control the brightness and it can get really bright. The tripod for your phone is the cutest little thing and both light and tripod seem quite sturdy. I can’t say how these items would work for someone more professional than 8 & 9 year olds but my kids enjoy them and the work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Viseur

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. Small enough for tabletop use, comes with a mirror, pictures look professional. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bewsher

customer_reviews.title: Was excited to try this out, but the light ...
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to try this out, but the light started to flicker after being on for a few minutes. Also wasn't as bright as I expected, even when at maximum brightness. Build quality left a little to be desired as well. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: bud78

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was a bit warmer
customer_reviews.text: The light is wonderful. Fit's perfectly in small spaces and on a desk/counter top but the light itself is a bright white light. There is no warmth to it and can be a bit harsh especially when turned all the way up. I wish there was an option to make the light warmer or whiter. Give us options!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Cowan

customer_reviews.title: It’s true to details
customer_reviews.text: I love it . All the pics are true . It’s easy and the light quality is awesome . This is how it came package in the box . The only thing it didn’t have was the instructions yet it was simple . Looking at the actual product pictures helped me assemble it .
customer_reviews.author: brittanie

customer_reviews.title: It's not for me
customer_reviews.text: The light is the ONLY thing I liked about this product. The part to tighten the light broke on 1st use. The stand for your phone, when the legs are fully extended they DO NOT lock. Constantly have to pull them back out. I have a note 9 phone. Neither stand stays tight when you tighten it. slowly untighten on it's own. Would not recommend for constant use such as vlogging or streaming.
customer_reviews.author: L S

customer_reviews.title: Bright but small
customer_reviews.text: This is a bright little tabletop light, but it just doesn’t work for makeup videos. The light is too small and it bounces off the center of your face rather than illuminating around it. The tripod also starts to become lose and wobbly after about 2 uses. The light is 4 stars, but the tripod is 2 so I settled with 3 overall. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about ordering this after seeing some reviews about broken items. I ordered it anyway and was glad that I did. It arrived well packaged without any damage. It was easy to put together and I love it. I purchased it for my freelance business but I might get another one for my makeup vanity as well. It is super bright and dimmable.
customer_reviews.author: msbuddafly

customer_reviews.title: An affordable ring light that works well
customer_reviews.text: Before I ordered my item I looked through the reviews and was a little nervous I would experience some of the same issues. I was pleasantly surprised when it exceeded my expectations. The box came well protected, instructions were in the box and easy to understand, and the light itself WOW! Can’t beat it. If you want a ring light but don’t want to break the bank buying one 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daven Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for makeup videos
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I'm amazed & cannot wait to record a makeup video. I cannot believe the brightness & it was so easy to put together. The little mirror is perfect for makeup application as it is somewhat a closeup mirror. Will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Paris Finesse

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this ring light! The lighting in my room is off which makes doing my makeup difficult at times. However when I purchased this ring light my lighting problems were gone. I wouldn’t suggest putting it on the brightest setting because it is pretty bright.
customer_reviews.author: Neshae

customer_reviews.title: Defective phone holder
customer_reviews.text: The top screw is defectively designed and it tilts like this when I open the plastic package. There is no way to fix it, it’s the product itself - a defective one. However, the shipping is really fast since it shows estimated deliver to Jan 27th, but it got delivered today. The light is strong for selfie. I hope i can use it for long time. Anyway the phone holder is a mess. I give 4 star for now.
customer_reviews.author: n__

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality lights, poor quality lighting
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought two of these to serve as video lights for my webcam setup (I use video meetings at work). Unfortunately, the light quality is quite poor, and makes me look sickly. Worse still, the threading for the stands was also done poorly at the factory, so they barely screw in, and are very unstable. I regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lee-Anna

customer_reviews.title: Amazed it's the best!
customer_reviews.text: I do lives on Facebook and Instagram doing makeup looks this makes my all dark brown living room light up! Not kidding I have chocolate brown leather couches, dark brown wood like floors and walls, dark brown tables and the lighting originally is very yellow and dark but this light helps so much. I don't even turn it all the way up!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Dowdican

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a vanity or to travel with for clients
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly the way it is pictured. Perfect for a vanity or to travel with for clients. It helps aid in taking great pictures. I just need a taller stand to take with me for clients. It sit perfectly on my vanity and lights up really well to do my make and take pictures. :) I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aline

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my ring light!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ring light purchase, and I’m in love! I didn’t want to spend an outrageous amount, so I’m so happy I found this one for such a great price. I love that the light is adjustable! And it’s the perfect size for my vanity. And the complimentary tripod is adorable! The light is super bright and makes all my photos and makeup sessions BOMB AF. Would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Liked but Died in 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product but I bought it in April 2019 and it already is not working in September 2019. The light no longer gets power. The green light goes on the adaptor when plugged in, but as soon as you try to turn on the light, the green light fades away and it never turns on. So I guess if you want to spend $32 for 5 months, it's a good deal. Unfortunately, my budget is tight, so I am without a light again for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for filming videos and for taking pictures. They look like they are taken by a professional. Extremely impressed by this product. Would definitely recommended to anyone that is looking for an improvement in their lighting set up total game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Kelso

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: It's not the greatest, but for the price its definitely good. I'd reccomend this for beginners with YouTube or something. But the lighting definitely looks "cheap." I bought colored filters to warm the color. Cuz against my pale skin, it looked bad, but with an orange filter, it looks more natural
customer_reviews.author: Anyssa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: I like that this small ring light was easy to set up and use. It is good for smaller things, but I needed a larger ring light, so ordered a 16" ring light after learning more about lighting. This will still get used for smaller projects--food & product photography.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Price

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy !!️
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeee this product amazing lighting especially if you are a makeup artist or even in the process of learning. It’s also very easy to put together took me less than a minute the shipping was quick
customer_reviews.author: Moesha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this light!! Perfect for video and photos. Easy to transport too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Bright dimable desk top ring light .
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying how much this desk ring light is absolutely amazing . U was shocked on how bright this is . The quality of the ring light is great. It is very sturdy it does have different levels of brightness. The only negative thing I have to say on this product is that it don't have different light tones but that's it .other then that I am very satisfied with this purchase .b
customer_reviews.author: valerie castillo

customer_reviews.title: Girls Favorite
customer_reviews.text: The light is great, it lasted for 4 months. The part that holds the phone broke almost immediately. The girls love the light for their pictures and videos. I wish the light would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: That Drippy Kid

customer_reviews.title: Very unstable, thin, wobbly
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife because she was always taking my ring light that I use in my home studio to do her makeup. I thought this would be a good solution, but this is basically a toy compared to a real ring light. Would be a good present for a child but it is not a very well built item.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Brown

customer_reviews.title: This works well. I even bought another one for my colleague
customer_reviews.text: This product works well. I especially like the way I can turn the knob to get just the right amount of light for my YouTube program series.
customer_reviews.author: Art Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely adore this light
customer_reviews.text: Sits very nicely on any table it gives great light for areas that are not well light. I use to do my makeup and it also has a mirror on it for the price you cant beat it. You don't need a lot to film if that is your goal
customer_reviews.author: Waves For Daies

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was seeking. Works perfectly upon inspection.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Ines

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 11 year old son to qork on his YouTube video. He love it..
customer_reviews.author: Jamie white

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting
customer_reviews.text: It's was a little difficult trying to figure out how to put it together. Other than that I love it
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Best mini light ever !!
customer_reviews.text: Best mini ring light I’ve ever traveled with. Bright sturdy and has lasted me two years now
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I've used this light a few times on projects for my blog. I like that it's great for face tutorials or to take selfies, however, I wish it was compatible with my tripod. It would make things a lot easier while filming videos or taking photos.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Torres

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very bright ring light. I love it and it works smoothly and is simple to assemble. It came quick as promised and had great customer service when i dealt with a previous issue! Thanks amazon.
customer_reviews.author: LyndseyMissMorgue

customer_reviews.title: Lights, Camera, Action!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beauty influencer and this gadget 100 percent gets the job done! Whether I'm shooting a tutorial or a snapchat. This is the most efficient portable ring light I have ever had. And hey, forget the camera! Just doing your makeup in this mirrored light is incredible. Also the tripod that comes with the light is quite durable. I would absolutely recommend this product to any vlogger, makeup artist, or photographer. 5 out of 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: MIchael Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Portable light for perfect selfies
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today. So far so good. This setup is quite easy and the directions come in the Box. This is perfect for General use, taking selfies recording video tutorials with better lighting. Looking forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my wedding photo booth
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my wedding photo booth and ended up with kind of a vanity mirror as well. Very small mirror, but the light and dimmer switch is awesome. It gets VERY bright if you want it to
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Donohue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my small vanity
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to sit on my vanity while I do my makeup. The lighting in our bedroom is not the best for doing makeup. But this definitely helps! I wish the mirror was a little bigger though! But it’s overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice light , I felt the included mirror should of been larger
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright, I felt the mirror inside should of been bigger or at least came close to fillling the inside
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The price is affordable and this ring light is really AMAZING if you're just doing it for the makeup. I would not recommend for recording for a vblog or anything of that sort. Overall, I enjoy this product.
customer_reviews.author: esther bazaldua

customer_reviews.title: Love it! This made my videos look so much ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This made my videos look so much better. The product is as pictured, it did take a minute to figure out how to put it together though as I didn't get instructions. But it wasn't that hard to figure out. I love it! Use it every day on my facebook lives!
customer_reviews.author: Fit Body Boot Camp of North Olmsted

customer_reviews.title: This lil light o'mine
customer_reviews.text: Shine bright shine far...be a star. The light is dope. Easy to use I mean it's a light. And hasnt burned out on me yet despite me leaving it on by accident all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Lighting
customer_reviews.text: Love this ring light. Great lighting and takes up little space.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to set up! Came packaged nicely and the dimming switch works really well. Wish there was an option to take off the mirror part/holder but other than that I don’t really mind it. Would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to have quality lighting on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, great lighting even thou the ring it's kinda small, attached mirror is good, but pretty small for me, other than it's a great product, I use it for Instagram videos :)

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Setup was very easy. I was up and running in minutes. A great product for beginning bloggers or business owners. The light is great and easily adjustable. No problems here.

customer_reviews.text: Love this!! My bedroom has the worst lighting for photos and I needed help. In my photo, all the lights are off in my room. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. It’s easy to assemble and the light is bright!

customer_reviews.title: Love

customer_reviews.title: Amazing

It lights up but flickers sometimes and needs the controls fiddled with to make the lighting stay on as a solid light. I'll give it to my 8 year old niece.

product_meta.title: 8-inch LED Selfie Ring Light for Phone Video Shooting Makeup YouTube Vine Portrait Photography with Stand Mirror Table Top Dimmable Camera Photo Lamps 24W 5500K Video Circle Lights
feature_bullets: 【Dimmable 8"LED Ring Light】Made of 120 SMD LED lamp beads and high-transmission ABS housing,LED beads place evenly inside the light without any dark corner for providing the most appropriate lighting,No annoying humming or flickering common with fluorescent bulbs. and it has good heat dissipation performance. More than 100000hrs service life,Power: 24W,Voltage:90-260V, Color temperature 5500K, Dimmable from 1% to 100%, meet all your needs in different circumstances.

【Sturdy Table Top Support Stand】the stand is designed with compact desktop size and two foldable arms, which will not take up much of your space for using or just for storing; Made of aluminum alloy material which ensures a long time use without getting rusty, it can support various ring lights without falling and always stays balanc; Simple structure for easy to set up; Lightweight makes it portable to carry around during your long time journey; It is a convenient support stand for ring light

【180° Rotation and Multifunction】The selfie ring light can 180 degree rotating.You can adjust the angle to provide the perfect light as needed. For make-up, live streaming, lay flat, selfie photos, filming, video recording, online teaching,youtobe video etc,or just works as desk tabletop lamp.It is the perfect dimmable daytime lighting to take away all the unflattering shadows.

【Universal Cell Phone Holder 】 The universal cell phone holder is very easy to use,Compatible with iPhone, Android and Works with DSLR Camera with a tripod mount! like iphone 8 plus/iphone 7 plus,8, 7, 6, 6s, 5, 5s, 4, 4s/Samsung/LG/Huawei/HTC,ect. Maximum width 4.1 inch. 【2-SIDE MAKEUP MIRROR】: Comes with one portable mirror with 3.5 inches/9cm diameter, a necessary tool for makeup artists,It has 2 side. One side is normal and another side can magnify 2 times to see details through the mirror.

【Service】If you are not satisfied with this product, you can send us an email and we will solve it for you.【Package information】: 1x8inch LED Ring Light +1xDesktop Bracket+1xMirror+1xMini Tripod+1x Phone Clip+1x US Power Adapter,NOTE: The camera and the smart phone in the picture are NOT included
